name: Skinwalker Elder
description: A master of transformation who has perfected the ancient arts. The Elder can shift between human, wolf, bear, and bird forms, each with unique abilities.

abilities.name: Wolf Form
abilities.description: Transforms into a swift wolf with increased speed and attack damage.

abilities.name: Bear Form
abilities.description: Transforms into a powerful bear with increased health and armor.

abilities.name: Crow Form
abilities.description: Transforms into a crow, gaining flight and scouting abilities.

abilities.name: Human Form
abilities.description: Returns to humanoid form, restoring base stats.

abilities.name: Terrifying Visage
abilities.description: Reveals true form, causing fear in nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Essence Drain
abilities.description: Drains essence from a target enemy.
